///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Test for simple Branch and Add (Compare, Branch if equal and Add, else branch to infinite loop)
// You should see #20 in dmem if this works
//0    MOV R0 #10
//1    MOV R1 #10
//2    NOP
//3    NOP
//4    NOP
//5    CMP R0, R1
//6    NOP
//7    BEQ  LABEL_1
//8    B    LABEL_2
// LABEL_1
//9    ADD R2, R0, R1
//10   NOP
//11   NOP
//12   B    LABEL_3
// LABEL_2
//13   NOP
//14   B    LABEL_2
// LABEL_3
//15   NOP          // END PROGRAM
----------------------------------------
Cond    I OpCo S Rn   Rd   Op2
1110 00 1 1101 0 0000 0000 000000001010 // MOV (imm)
1110 00 1 1101 0 0000 0001 000000001010 // MOV (imm)
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000

Cond    I OpCo S Rn   Rd   Op2      Rm
1110 00 0 1010 1 0000 0000 00000000 0001 // cmp r0, r1 : CMP (reg)
11101100000000000000000000000000

Cond     L Offset
0000 101 0 000000000000000000001001 // beq Label_1 : Branch EQ to inst. 9
0000 101 0 000000000000000000001101 // b Label_2 : Branch to inst. 13

Cond    I OpCo S Rn   Rd   Shift    Rm
1110 00 0 0100 0 0000 0010 00000000 0001 // ADD R0 + R1 (reg)
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000

Cond     L Offset
0000 101 0 000000000000000000001111 // b Label_3 : Branch to inst. 15
11101100000000000000000000000000

Cond     L Offset
0000 101 0 000000000000000000001101 // b Label_2 : Branch to inst. 13
11101100000000000000000000000000
--------------------------------------------
IMEM:
11100011101000000000000000001010
11100011101000000001000000001010
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11100001010100000000000000000001
11101100000000000000000000000000
00001010000000000000000000001001
00001010000000000000000000001101
11100000100000000010000000000001
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
00001010000000000000000000001111
11101100000000000000000000000000
00001010000000000000000000001101
11101100000000000000000000000000

DMEM:
not needed, no loads

Expected Result: 
Z = 1
C = 1
R0 = 10 (Hex 0xA)
R1 = 10 (Hex 0xA)
R2 = 20 (Hex 0x14)
